verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Whenever I start believing in the word I've heard,
Then my feet become like hinds' feet
On the mountain of the Lord:
And I go leaping o'er the mountains,
And I go skipping o'er the hills,
And I soar through the air like an eagle
O'er the mountains and the fields;
And I sing the songs of Zion
With a voice that's loud and sure,
And the chains I've known become stepping stones,
Whenever I act upon God's word.
